Class Variable

A handle on a single entity. A particle's manifest dictates the types of handles that need to be connected to that particle, and the current recipe identifies which handles are connected.

Hierarchy

  • Handle
    • Variable

clear

  • clear(): Promise<void>
    • Defined in runtime/handle.ts:346

    Clears any entity currently in the Variable.

    throws

    {Error} if this variable is not configured as a writeable handle (i.e. 'out' or 'inout') in the particle's manifest.

    Returns Promise<void>

get

  • get(): Promise<ParticleSpec | Reference | EntityInterface>
    • Defined in runtime/handle.ts:299
    throws

    {Error} if this variable is not configured as a readable handle (i.e. 'in' or 'inout') in the particle's manifest.

    Returns Promise<ParticleSpec | Reference | EntityInterface>

    the Entity contained by the Variable, or undefined if the Variable is cleared.
